title: Ancient Aliens at Thanksgiving
description: A three-part special. New evidence suggests that the first exchanging of food between the Pilgrims and Native Americans may have been visited by aliens.
quote: In every journal entry we researched from those early Pilgirms, not one entry mentions aliens not being there.
altHero: a grainy photograph of the Pilgrims eating Thanksgiving dinner with the Native Americans as an alien serves them food
alt2: a cartoon man with a professor look speaks to the camera
alt3: a Thanksgiving table but everyone is an alien
alt4: a Pilgrim and corn-themed city of gold
